classes.name: Wizard
classes.role: Master of arcane magic and knowledge

features_at_level.name: Spellcasting
features_at_level.description: Cast Wizard spells using INT. Spellbook with 6 spells. Prepare INT mod + level spells.

features_at_level.name: Arcane Recovery
features_at_level.description: Once per day on short rest, recover spell slots totaling half level (rounded up).

features_at_level.name: Spell Mastery
features_at_level.description: Choose one 1st and one 2nd level spell. Cast them at lowest level without expending slots.

features_at_level.name: Ability Score Improvement
features_at_level.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two by 1, or take a feat.

features_at_level.name: Signature Spells
features_at_level.description: Choose two 3rd-level spells. Always prepared, cast once each without slot, regain on short rest.

features_at_level.name: Finesse Fighting
features_at_level.description: Use DEX for attack rolls with light/one-handed piercing weapons. Can still add STR to damage.

features_at_level.name: Fighting Style (Dueling)
features_at_level.description: Gain the Dueling Fighting Style feat.

features_at_level.name: Luck Die
features_at_level.description: Roll Luck Die (d4) to influence rolls. Max roll = auto-success, 1 = auto-fail, above half = add, below half = subtract.

features_at_level.name: Canny Defense
features_at_level.description: While in light/no armor with one hand free, add INT mod to AC.

features_at_level.name: Grace
features_at_level.description: With 1+ unused Luck Points, gain +2 on DEX saving throws.

features_at_level.name: Nimble Acrobat
features_at_level.description: Move through larger creatures' spaces. Add DEX to Acrobatics. Ignore difficult terrain when moving 10+ ft.

features_at_level.name: Parry
features_at_level.description: When hit by melee attack, roll Luck Die + DEX to reduce damage. Max roll = disarm attempt.

features_at_level.name: Quick-Witted
features_at_level.description: Gain proficiency in Insight and Deception.

features_at_level.name: Insightful Strike
features_at_level.description: Add INT mod to damage with finesse weapons (not vs oozes/undead).

features_at_level.name: Ability Score Improvement
features_at_level.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two by 1, or take a feat.

features_at_level.name: Daring Strike
features_at_level.description: Spend 1 Luck Point to add Luck Die to damage. Max roll = target frightened.

features_at_level.name: Seductive Charm
features_at_level.description: CHA mod uses/day. Use Bluff to charm NPCs and extract secrets.

4.resource_changes: Luck Points: 2, Seductive Charm: CHA mod

features_at_level.name: Riposte
features_at_level.description: When creature misses you with melee attack, make a melee attack against them.

features_at_level.name: Make My Own Luck
features_at_level.description: Once/day after rest, roll Luck Die and store result for use within 24 hours.

features_at_level.name: Lucky Reroll
features_at_level.description: 1/day, reroll any d20 roll. Must take second result.

5.resource_changes: Luck Points: 2, Make My Own Luck: 1, Lucky Reroll: 1

features_at_level.name: Grace in Steel
features_at_level.description: Luck abilities now work in medium armor.

features_at_level.name: Dazzling Feint
features_at_level.description: Feint opponent with CHA. On success, target blinded until end of next turn.

features_at_level.name: Evasive Footwork
features_at_level.description: Gain Evasion. DEX save for half = no damage.

features_at_level.name: Disarming Flourish
features_at_level.description: Spend 1 Luck Point to disarm. Add Luck Die + CHA to attempt. Max roll = target prone.

features_at_level.name: Ability Score Improvement
features_at_level.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two by 1, or take a feat.

features_at_level.name: Precise Strike
features_at_level.description: +1d6 precision damage with finesse weapons (not vs oozes/undead).

features_at_level.name: Elusive Step
features_at_level.description: Gain Uncanny Dodge. Cannot be flanked or caught off-guard by creatures you can see.

features_at_level.name: Duelist's Wit
features_at_level.description: 1/short rest. Add Luck Die to any CHA-based check.

features_at_level.name: Deflection Mastery
features_at_level.description: When enemy within 30ft makes ranged attack, roll Luck Die. Above half = deflect. Max roll = redirect to creature within 10ft.

features_at_level.name: Ability Score Improvement
features_at_level.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two by 1, or take a feat.

features_at_level.name: Perfect Timing
features_at_level.description: When creature misses you, spend 1 Luck Point for opportunity attack. Max roll = regain Luck Point.

features_at_level.name: Death Defied
features_at_level.description: At 0 HP, spend 2 Luck Points to drop to 1 HP, heal Luck Die, and Dodge.

features_at_level.name: Weakening Critical
features_at_level.description: On critical hit, roll Luck Die to reduce target's STR, DEX, or CON by result for 1 minute.

features_at_level.name: Ability Score Improvement
features_at_level.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two by 1, or take a feat.

features_at_level.name: Perfect Riposte
features_at_level.description: When Riposte hits, target must CON save or be Staggered (one action) on next turn.

features_at_level.name: Slippery Mind
features_at_level.description: If you fail save vs enchantment, roll again after 1 round. One second chance per effect.

features_at_level.name: Supreme Grace
features_at_level.description: Add current Luck Points to all DEX-based skill checks and saving throws.

features_at_level.name: Ability Score Improvement
features_at_level.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two by 1, or take a feat.

features_at_level.name: Master Duelist
features_at_level.description: Freedom of Movement, Truesight. +2 on finesse attacks. 1/round auto-succeed DEX check/save. Max Luck roll = regain 1 Luck Point.

classes.name: Shaman
classes.role: Spiritual caster, spirit guide, totem wielder

features_at_level.name: Shaman Spellcasting
features_at_level.description: Cast Shaman spells using WIS. Prepare WIS mod + level spells. Ritual casting.

features_at_level.name: Totemic Magic
features_at_level.description: Choose Totem Spirit (Bear, Eagle, Wolf). Grants bonus spells unique to that totem.

features_at_level.name: Spirit Guide
features_at_level.description: Ethereal companion grants Spiritual Guidance, Turn Spirit (1+WIS mod/day), and Ritual Aid.

features_at_level.name: Detect Spirits
features_at_level.description: Detect spirits within 60ft radius. Discern number, location, and hostility.

features_at_level.name: Spirit Sight
features_at_level.description: See into Ethereal Plane 30ft. See invisible creatures and true forms of spirits.

features_at_level.name: Divination Insight
features_at_level.description: Enhanced rituals. 1/long rest: gain +2 bonus on one roll within 10 minutes.

features_at_level.name: Chastise Spirits
features_at_level.description: 3+CHA mod uses/day. Deal level d6 radiant to spirits/incorporeal within 30ft.

2.resource_changes: Chastise Spirits: 3 + CHA mod, Divination Insight: 1

features_at_level.name: Spirit Blessing
features_at_level.description: 10ft aura (15ft at L9, 30ft at L15). Totem-specific: Bear (temp HP + poison resist), Eagle (+1 ranged), Wolf (+1 melee near allies).

features_at_level.name: Ability Score Improvement
features_at_level.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two by 1, or take a feat.

features_at_level.name: Totem Aspect
features_at_level.description: Totem traits manifest. Bear: temp HP at combat start. Eagle: +10ft speed. Wolf: darkvision 30ft.

features_at_level.name: Greater Boon
features_at_level.description: 1/day. Bear: +2 STR, temp HP, +1d6 melee. Eagle: fly 1 min, allies +WIS DEX checks. Wolf: summon wolf pack.

features_at_level.name: Spirit Shield
features_at_level.description: Totem damage resistance. Bear: nonmagical B/P/S. Eagle: lightning. Wolf: piercing + necrotic.

features_at_level.name: Totem Bond
features_at_level.description: Additional blessing. Bear: necrotic resist or more temp HP. Eagle: anti-prone/grapple or Swift Strike. Wolf: +WIS damage or keen smell.

features_at_level.name: Ability Score Improvement
features_at_level.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two by 1, or take a feat.

features_at_level.name: Enhanced Totem Aspect
features_at_level.description: Bear: temp HP lasts 1 hour, +WIS STR checks. Eagle: +20ft speed, ignore climbing terrain. Wolf: senses 60ft, detect ethereal.

features_at_level.name: Spirit Recall
features_at_level.description: 1/day. Recover spell slots (1st-3rd level) or heal HP equal to Shaman level.

features_at_level.name: Cantrip Versatility
features_at_level.description: Replace one cantrip when you gain a level.

features_at_level.name: Ability Score Improvement
features_at_level.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two by 1, or take a feat.

features_at_level.name: Totem Mastery
features_at_level.description: Totem Aspect always active. Bear: +max HP = WIS mod. Eagle: +20ft permanent. Wolf: senses 90ft.

features_at_level.name: Greater Channeling
features_at_level.description: 1/day. Bear: Wrath (+2 STR, +2d6 melee). Eagle: Winds (fly 60ft 10 min). Wolf: Pack (summon wolves).

features_at_level.name: Improved Spirit Shield
features_at_level.description: Bear: all nonmagical resist, poison immunity. Eagle: lightning+thunder resist, deflect ranged. Wolf: necrotic+psychic resist, heal allies.

features_at_level.name: Spirit Form
features_at_level.description: 1/day. Partially ethereal. Pass through walls, resist physical damage, Truesight 60ft.

features_at_level.description: Enhanced Spirit Form. Bear: aura grants temp HP, +2d6 melee, +2 STR/CON. Eagle: fly 90ft, Call Lightning at will, +2 DEX/WIS. Wolf: claw/bite attacks, Alpha's Howl (frighten 60ft), +30ft speed.

features_at_level.name: Ability Score Improvement
features_at_level.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two by 1, or take a feat.

features_at_level.description: Type becomes Fey. Permanent Avatar form. DR 5/cold iron. Truesight 120ft. Immune to charm/frighten by spirits/undead. Speak with all spirits.

features_at_level.name: Exalted or Vile Presence
features_at_level.description: +level to CHA checks with members of your faith. At L4, extends to same alignment.

features_at_level.description: Darkvision 60ft, low-light vision. At L10, see through magical darkness.

features_at_level.description: Weapon Focus with deity's favored weapon. Can imbue with divine light (20ft radius).

features_at_level.description: Once per turn, +1d8 radiant/necrotic on weapon hit. 2d8 at L14.

features_at_level.name: Potent Spellcasting
features_at_level.description: Add WIS mod to Cleric cantrip damage.

features_at_level.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two by 1, or take a feat.

features_at_level.description: Fly speed 60ft. Feathered wings (good), bat wings (evil), or choice (neutral).

features_at_level.description: Gain Domain 1's 17th-level feature.

features_at_level.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two by 1, or take a feat.
